title: Video: PINS – Get With Me
content:
Manchester post-punk darlings PINS are set to release their debut album, Girls Like Us, through Bella Union on 30 September, and recent single Get With me captures the energy that has made them one of the must see acts on the current festival circuit.

This self-produced video shot on Super 8 at Brighton beach, perfectly mirrors the DIY aesthetic of their sound, snarlingly cutting yet strangely danceable. All it’s missing is a trampoline… Check out Get With Me below, and pre-order Girls Like Us here. Also, check out a bunch of tour dates after the jump.

5 October – Sheffield, Harley
7 October – Bristol, Louisiana
8 October – Brighton, The Hope
9 October – London, Birthdays
10 October – Norwich, Hog in Armour
11 October – Newcastle, Cluny
12 October – Glasgow, Broadcast
15 October – Liverpool, Leaf
16 October – Birmingham, Bull’s Head
17 October – Leeds, Belgrave Music Hall
24 October – Lille (France), La Peniche
25 October – Paris (France), Point Ephemere
26 October – Lyon (France), Le Sonic

PINS – GET WITH ME from PINS on Vimeo.
